name: Turnit
description:
TurnIt The game is still on development. Feedback any bugs to comment

1-bit pixel platformer game which you rotate the world around you to complete the levels. Based on easy dificulty. Movement is junky so you shouldn't use it all the time

I'm working on a game right now and if you want to support me, here is my patreon page. If you can't, just leave a comment. It also helps me

Controls:
  • MOVE:  A and D / Left and Right arrow
  • JUMP: Space / W / Up arrow
  • ROTATE: Q and E / Left and Right sides
  • PAUSE: Escape / P
  • ZOOM: Z

Feel free to leave a comment. It supports my morale a lot

The game is still in development. New things will be added

Note: Android version might not open. I suggest not downloading it
